text.5_Chapter, 5_Verse: And they shall be, these statements that I command to you on this day, on your heart.
text.10_Chapter, 12_Verse: And it shall be if you surely listen to my commandments that I am commanding to you today: to love YY your God, and to worship before him with all your hearts and all your souls.
text.5_Chapter, 4_Verse: And you shall love YY your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your wealth.
text.5_Chapter, 7_Verse: And you shall tie them as a sign on your hand, and they shall be Tefillin between your eyes.
text.10_Chapter, 13_Verse: And I will give the rain of your land in its time, early and late, and you will gather your grain, and your wine, and your oil.
text.10_Chapter, 14_Verse: And I will give the plant in your field for your animal and your will eat and be satisfied.
text.5_Chapter, 6_Verse: And you shall repeat them to your children and you shall speak with them when you are sitting in your house and when you go walking on the road and when you lie down and when you stand up.
text.10_Chapter, 16_Verse: And it will be vehement, the anger of of YY, upon you, and he will close the Heavens, and there will not be the rain, and the land won't give its produce, and you will perish quickly from the land that is good that YY *gave* to you.
text.5_Chapter, 8_Verse: And you shall write them on m'zuzahs and attach them to the doorposts of your house and on your gates.
text.5_Chapter, 3_Verse: Hear Israel YY is our God YY is one.
text.10_Chapter, 15_Verse: Beware for yourselves lest your hearts wander and you deviate and you worship the idols of the nations and you will bow to them.
